item.title: Taskfile - A better build tool than Makefile
item.description: I. What is Taskfile Taskfile describes various execution tasks via yaml, and its core is written in go; it is more modern and easier to use than Makefile’s tab splitting and bash combination syntax (although it becomes a yaml engineer). Taskfile has advanced features such as built-in dynamic variables, operating system and other environment variable recognition that are more in line with the modern way of Coding. In general, if
